A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I understand why some fans were disappointed in the direction this movie took and questions left unanswered\, and to be honest i was a little disappointed at first\, but the more I thought about it\, some of those decisions were what made me end up liking it. Its what made it more believable and relatable. You don’t always get what you want. Things don’t always work out wrapped up in a pretty little package. And you don’t always get all the answers right away. Thats life. Keep in mind\, this trilogy still has another movie to go. Perhaps the things that don’t make sense right now\, will\, when that one is released. And the mystery building up to that point will make it all the better.
